User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block only sensitive administrative areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /super-admin-dashboard/
Disallow: /tenant-management/
Disallow: /api/auth/
Disallow: /api/admin/
Disallow: /patient-portal-staff/

# Block payment and checkout processes
Disallow: /checkout/
Disallow: /payment-success/
Disallow: /subscription-success/
Disallow: /billing/

# Block internal reports and logs
Disallow: /reports/
Disallow: /audit-logs/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://navimedi.org/sitemap.xml
